title.bibl: Star, May 12, 1905. Greek Government's Representative in Chicago

div.bibl: Star, May 12, 1905. GREEK GOVERNMENT'S REPRESENTATIVE IN CHICAGO

body.p: p. 2- Apostolos Agathokles, who represented the Greek government at the International Railway Convention in Washington, D.C., is visiting Chicago as part of his mission to America.

The distinguished visitor, who is accompanied by his wife, the sister of a well-to-do merchant of our city, K. Karelopoulos, will remain here for a few days as the guest of honor of the Greek community in Chicago.
